newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Guoco unit buys out Pepsi Philippines.
newsitem.headline: Guoco unit buys out Pepsi Philippines.

text.p: Guoco Holdings (Philippines) Inc said on Tuesday it has acquired a total of 82.4 percent interest in Pepsi-Cola Products Philippines Inc.
In a statement to the Philippine Stock Exchange, Guoco Holdings said its unit Guoco Industries Inc had completed its 100 percent of the capital of Premier Beverages Philippines Inc.
Premier Beverages owns 51.5 percent of Pepsi-Cola Products Philippines.
Guoco Holdings also used Premier to aquire another 28.9 percent stake in Pepsi-Cola Products Philippines by buying the shares of Pepsi-Cola Far East Trade Development Co Inc.
Guoco Industries bought an additional two percent stake in the soft drinks
